mapper.select: SELECT MCD. COMPANY_CD , MCD.COMPANY_NM , MCD.DIVISION_CD , MCD.DIVISION_NM , TO_CHAR(MC.DATE_ID,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DATE_ID , MC.YEAR , MC.QUARTER , MC.MONTH , SUBSTR(MC.WEEK,5) AS WEEK , MC.WEEK_DAY , TO_CHAR(MC.WEEK_START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WEEK_START_DATE , TO_CHAR(MC.WEEK_END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WEEK_END_DATE , MC.DAY_OFF_YN , MC.DESCRIPTION , MC.UPDATE_BY , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_USER_NAME(MC.COMPANY_CD, MC.DIVISION_CD, MC.UPDATE_BY) FROM DUAL ) AS UPDATE_BY_NM , TO_CHAR(MC.UPDATE_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPDATE_DATE , TO_CHAR(MC.DATE_ID,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS KEY_ID FROM MOM_COM_DIV_V MCD , MOM_CALENDAR MC WHERE MCD.COMPANY_CD = MC.COMPANY_CD AND MCD.DIVISION_CD = MC.DIVISION_CD AND MC.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MC.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MC.DATE_ID >= TO_DATE(#{startDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND MC.DATE_ID < TO_DATE(#{endDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 0.99999 ORDER BY MCD.COMPANY_NM, MCD.DIVISION_NM, MC.DATE_ID
